verses.verse: And after <WG3326> these things <WG5023> Jesus <WG2424> walked <WG4043> in <WG1722> Galilee <WG1056>: for <WG1063> he would <WG2309> not <WG3756> walk <WG4043> in <WG1722> Judaea <WG2449>, because <WG3754> the Jews <WG2453> sought <WG2212> to kill <WG615> him <WG846>.
